title: CI/CD Pipeline for Hostinger Deployment
description: Implement automated CI/CD using GitHub Actions to deploy the megadev.ai static site to Hostinger whenever changes are pushed to the main branch. Success Criteria: Push to main triggers automated workflow, tests run and must pass before deployment, build artifacts are deployed to Hostinger via FTPS, deployment failures notify developers, rollback capability exists.
close_reason: CI/CD pipeline fully implemented and deployed. Workflow file created with tests, caching, rollback capability. Documentation and badge added.

title: Research and Document Hostinger FTP/FTPS Credentials
description: Gather and document the FTP/FTPS credentials needed for automated deployment from Hostinger's control panel. Tasks: Log into Hostinger hPanel, navigate to Files → FTP Accounts, note down or create dedicated FTP credentials (FTP Host, Username, Password, server path), determine if FTPS is available and the port.

title: Add Pre-deployment Checks
description: Add additional quality gates before deployment. Optional checks: Lighthouse CI for performance budgets, Bundle size check, Security audit (npm audit), Lint check. Minimal: npm audit --audit-level=high with continue-on-error.

title: Configure GitHub Repository Secrets
description: Add the FTP credentials as encrypted secrets in the GitHub repository settings. Tasks: Navigate to GitHub repo → Settings → Secrets and variables → Actions, create secrets: FTP_SERVER, FTP_USERNAME, FTP_PASSWORD.

title: Create Basic GitHub Actions Workflow File
description: Create the initial .github/workflows/deploy.yml workflow file with build and deploy stages. Include: trigger on push to main branch, Node.js 20.x setup, npm ci, npm run build, deploy using SamKirkland/FTP-Deploy-Action@v4.3.6.
close_reason: Workflow file created at .github/workflows/deploy.yml with build, test, and FTPS deployment

title: Add Testing Stage to CI Pipeline
description: Add automated testing before the build stage to ensure only passing code gets deployed. Run npm run test:run for unit tests, configure test to fail the workflow if tests fail.
close_reason: Tests included in workflow (npm run test:run before build)

title: Add TypeScript Type Checking Stage
description: Ensure TypeScript type checking passes before deployment. Note: The build command already includes tsc, but explicit checking provides clearer error messages. May be redundant since npm run build already runs tsc && vite build.
close_reason: TypeScript checking covered by npm run build which runs tsc && vite build

title: Configure Deployment Notifications
description: Set up notifications for deployment success/failure. Options: GitHub native email notifications, Slack integration, Discord integration. Minimal: Add workflow status badge to README.

title: Add Build Artifact Caching
description: Optimize CI/CD performance with proper caching. npm dependencies are already cached via actions/setup-node with cache: npm. Consider caching Vite build cache for faster rebuilds.
close_reason: npm caching configured via actions/setup-node with cache: npm

title: Create Deployment Documentation
description: Document the CI/CD pipeline setup, secrets required, and troubleshooting steps. Update existing documentation or create DEPLOYMENT.md. Include: how the pipeline works, required secrets and how to update them, how to trigger manual deployment, troubleshooting common issues, rollback procedures.
close_reason: DEPLOYMENT.md created with setup guide, troubleshooting, and rollback procedures

title: Implement Rollback Capability
description: Create ability to rollback to previous deployment if issues are discovered. Options: Git-based rollback (revert commit and push triggers new deploy), Manual workflow (deploy specific commit/tag), Artifact storage. Recommended: Git-based with workflow_dispatch for manual deployment of specific ref.
close_reason: workflow_dispatch with ref input allows deploying any commit/branch/tag
